name: 劉俊麟
objective:
微處理器是各種需要高性能的電子產品中的主要元件之一，微處理器技術對電機與電子工程師而言，日益重要。本課程將介紹近代微處理機之發展、微處理機架構、軟體環境、組合語言程式、周邊電路設計。課程將以 x86/x64 微處理器例，以綜合性的方式介紹處理器的一般原理，學習後可應用相同原理於其他類型的微處理器或嵌入式微處理器中。

Microprocessors are one of the major components of a wide variety of electronic products that require high performance, and microprocessor technologies are increasingly important for electrical/electronic engineers. This course will cover the topics of modern microprocessors developments, microprocessor architecture, software environment, assembly language programming, and peripheral circuit design. The course introduces the general and basic principles of processors in a comprehensive manner and uses x86/x64 microprocessor as examples, and the same principles learned can be applied to other types of microprocessors or embedded microprocessors.
